actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration Integrity, Security, and Enforcement

official_title: To enhance the public safety by rendering aliens ineligible to receive visas and ineligible for admission to the United States if their entry poses a danger to national security, and for other purposes.
short_title: Inadmissibility of National Security Aliens Act

summary.text: Inadmissibility of National Security Aliens Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to prohibit the entry of an alien who the Secretary of State or the Secretary of Homeland Security has reason to believe poses a danger to national security.

titles.title: Inadmissibility of National Security Aliens Act

To enhance the public safety by rendering aliens ineligible to receive visas and ineligible for admission to the United States if their entry poses a danger to national security, and for other purposes.
Inadmissibility of National Security Aliens Act
